settings.title: Settings
settings.deleteAllDataSuccess: All accounts, groups, and messages have been deleted
settings.signOutDescription: Are you sure you want to sign out of this account? If you haven't backed up your keys, you won't be able to recover them.
settings.deleteAllDataDescription:
This will delete all group and message data, and sign you out of all accounts but will not delete your nostr keys or any other events you've published to relays.

Are you sure you want to delete all data from White Noise? This cannot be undone.
settings.publishKeyPackageDescription: Are you sure you want to publish a new Key Package event to relays?
settings.deleteAllKeyPackagesDescription: Are you sure you want to delete all key packages?

nostrKeys.title: Nostr Keys
nostrKeys.publicKeyDescription: Your public key is your unique identifier in the Nostr network, enabling others to verify and recognize your messages. Share it openly!
nostrKeys.privateKeyDescription: Private key works like a secret password that grants access to your Nostr identity.
nostrKeys.privateKeyWarningDescription: Don't share your private key publicly, and use it only to log in to other Nostr apps.

network.title: Network
network.noInboxRelays: You don't have any inbox relays configured.
network.noKeyPackageRelays: You don't have any key package relays configured.
network.invalidRelayUrlFormat: Invalid format: must start with 'wss://' or 'ws://'
network.inboxRelayAlreadyConfigured: This relay URL is already in your inbox relay list
network.keyPackageRelayAlreadyConfigured: This relay URL is already in your key package relay list

wallet.title: Wallet
wallet.connectionDescription: Connect your bitcoin lightning wallet to send and receive payments in White Noise.
wallet.informationAnswer: You can connect any wallet that supports Nostr Wallet Connect. See a full list

chats.startNewChat: Click the "+" button to start a new chat
chats.contactsLoadingError: Sorry, we couldn't load contacts because of an error.
chats.contactNotSetUp: is not yet set up to use secure messaging
chats.sendInviteQuestion: Do you want to invite them to White Noise? We'll send them a legacy direct message via Nostr with a link to download the app.
chats.privateChatInvite: You're invited to join a private chat
chats.groupChatInvite: You're invited to join a group chat with {memberCount} members
chats.inviteAccepted: You've accepted an invite to join a secure chat with {name}
chats.inviteDeclined: You've declined an invite to join a secure chat with {name}
chats.waitMediaUpload: Please wait for uploads to complete

login.signInDescription: Your key will be encrypted and stored only on your device.
